name: The Secret of Monkey Island 2 (Early Access)
name_original: The Secret of Monkey Island 2 (Early Access)
description:
The Secret of Monkey Island 2 (Early Access) is a game developed by mauisland. It came out on 10-02-2023.
The Secret of Monkey Island 2 (Early Access) is available on Android, Linux, macOS and PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
